content.text:
# 6th Hollywood Critics Association Midseason Film Awards

}}
The winners of the 6th Hollywood Critics Association Midseason Film Awards, presented by the Hollywood Critics Association, were revealed on June 30, 2023, on the association's official Twitter page.
The nominations were announced on June 27, 2023. Air and Past Lives led the nominations with seven each, followed by ''Are You There God? It's Me, Margaret. with six; Asteroid City, BlackBerry, John Wick: Chapter 4, and Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse received three apiece.
Past Lives received the most awards with three wins, including Best Actress (Greta Lee), followed by Air and Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse with two wins each; the latter won Best Picture and Best Director (Joaquim Dos Santos, Kemp Powers, and Justin K. Thompson).
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first and highlighted with boldface
